channel.title: Multi zone image
channel.description:
Hey guys, i really need some help. Ive honestly looked everywhere on how to find and change this image but i just can't seem to do it and i'm beyond frustrated. The multi sign is the protect from missiles image. In the cache i looked at the multi image and it shows up with the correct image (crossing swords)
http://postimg.org/image/vt0rbp10r/

item.title: Multi zone image
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

okay so your client may have different icons/interfaces in the cache. try finding interface lists for the wild one, and then just do the ::interface commands until you find one that works

Read full topic

item.title: Multi zone image
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

wait whats this? [code=java]if (hasMultiSign && !multiCombat())
{
frame61(-1);
hasMultiSign = false;
}

if (multiCombat())
{
frame61(1);
hasMultiSign = false;
}
if (!multiCombat())
{
frame61(0);
hasMultiSign = false;
}
if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))
{
if (!hasWildySign)
{
hasWildySign = true;
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("", 199);
}
int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;
if (level != wildyLevel)
{
wildyLevel = level;
sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199);
}
if (multiCombat())
{
frame61(1);
hasMultiSign = false;
}
if (!multiCombat())
{
frame61(-1);
hasMultiSign = false;
}
[/code]

Read full topic
